column4: Grawity: This is what I am talking about http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1136850 and https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/351656
So I just wanted to know if there is any way to disable IPV6 on Ubu9.04 without recompiling my kernel (I'm too much of a noob to mess with it)
i presume there is a boot time parameter you can pass to the kernel as well with GRUB (haven't fiddled with that myself in a looong time though)
